author: Special Correspondent
text:
The finals of The Hindu Young World Painting Competition 2016 will be held at Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall here on Saturday.

It will be held under two categories – Juniors (class 4 to 6) and Seniors (class 7 to 9).

Children chosen for the finals have been intimated individually about their selection.

Registration for the finals will commence at 9 a.m. at the venue.

The finals will begin at 9.30 a.m.

Topics will be announced on the spot and prizes will be distributed to the winners by B. T. Bangera, Managing Director, Hi-Tech Arai, immediately after the finals.

Besides the top three prizes for the winners, there will be many consolation prizes. All the children will get a participation certificate. The competition is presented by Thyrocare.

The venue sponsor is Society for Community Organisation Trust.
title: Painting competition today
